verses.verse: And when <S%H1961><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> was ninety <S%H8673><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and nine, <S%H8672><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, I am the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> God; <S%H410><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, and be you perfect. <S%H8549><s%>
And I will make <S%H5414><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you, and will multiply <S%H7235><s%> you exceedingly. <S%H3966><s%>
And Abram <S%H87><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his face: <S%H6440><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> with him, saying, <S%H559><s%>
As for me, behold, <S%H2009><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> is with you, and you shall be a father <S%H1><s%> of many <S%H1995><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall your name <S%H8034><s%> any <S%H5750><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> be called <S%H7121><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> but your name <S%H8034><s%> shall be Abraham; <S%H85><s%> for a father <S%H1><s%> of many <S%H1995><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> have I made <S%H5414><s%> you.
And I will make you exceeding <S%H3966><s%> fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> of you, and kings <S%H4428><s%> shall come <S%H3318><s%> out of you.

And I will establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you and your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you in their generations <S%H1755><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> to be a God <S%H430><s%> to you, and to your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> to you, and to your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, the land <S%H776><s%> wherein you are a stranger, <S%H4033><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> possession; <S%H272><s%> and I will be their God. <S%H430><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> therefore, you, and your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you in their generations. <S%H1755><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall keep, <S%H8104><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you and your seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you; Every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H2145><s%> child among you shall be circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>
And you shall circumcise <S%H5243><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your foreskin; <S%H6190><s%> and it shall be a token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you.

And he that is eight <S%H8083><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shall be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> among you, every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H2145><s%> child in your generations, <S%H1755><s%> he that is born <S%H3211><s%> in the house, <S%H1004><s%> or bought <S%H4736><s%> with money <S%H3701><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> stranger, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5235><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is not of your seed. <S%H2233><s%>

He that is born <S%H3211><s%> in your house, <S%H1004><s%> and he that is bought <S%H4736><s%> with your money, <S%H3701><s%> must needs <S%H4135><s%> be circumcised: <S%H4135><s%> and my covenant <S%H1285><s%> shall be in your flesh <S%H1320><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

And the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> man <S%H2145><s%> child whose <S%H834><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin <S%H6190><s%> is not circumcised, <S%H4135><s%> that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from his people; <S%H5971><s%> he has broken <S%H6565><s%> my covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> As for Sarai <S%H8297><s%> your wife, <S%H802><s%> you shall not call <S%H7121><s%> her name <S%H8034><s%> Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> but Sarah <S%H8283><s%> shall her name <S%H8034><s%> be.

And I will bless <S%H1288><s%> her, and give <S%H5414><s%> you a son <S%H1121><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> of her: yes, I will bless <S%H1288><s%> her, and she shall be a mother of nations; <S%H1471><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%> shall be of her.

Then Abraham <S%H85><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face, <S%H6440><s%> and laughed, <S%H6711><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> Shall a child be born <S%H3205><s%> to him that is an hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old? <S%H1121><s%> and shall Sarah, <S%H8283><s%> that is ninety <S%H8673><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1323><s%> bear? <S%H3205><s%>
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> O that Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> might live <S%H2421><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you!

And God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Sarah <S%H8283><s%> your wife <S%H802><s%> shall bear <S%H3205><s%> you a son <S%H1121><s%> indeed; <S%H61><s%> and you shall call <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Isaac: <S%H3327><s%> and I will establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and with his seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

And as for Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> I have heard <S%H8085><s%> you: Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have blessed <S%H1288><s%> him, and will make him fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and will multiply <S%H7235><s%> him exceedingly; <S%H3966><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> shall he beget, <S%H3205><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> him a great <S%H1419><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%>

But my covenant <S%H1285><s%> will I establish <S%H6965><s%> with Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Sarah <S%H8283><s%> shall bear <S%H3205><s%> to you at this <S%H2088><s%> set <S%H4150><s%> time in the next <S%H312><s%> year. <S%H8141><s%>
And he left <S%H3615><s%> off talking <S%H1696><s%> with him, and God <S%H430><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from Abraham. <S%H85><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that were born <S%H3211><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that were bought <S%H4736><s%> with his money, <S%H3701><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> among the men <S%H582><s%> of Abraham's <S%H85><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%> and circumcised <S%H4135><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of their foreskin <S%H6190><s%> in the selfsame <S%H2088><s%> <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%> to him.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> was ninety <S%H8673><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and nine, <S%H8672><s%> when he was circumcised <S%H4135><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin. <S%H6190><s%>

And Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> was thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> when he was circumcised <S%H4135><s%> in the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin. <S%H6190><s%>
In the selfsame <S%H2088><s%> <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> was Abraham <S%H85><s%> circumcised, <S%H4135><s%> and Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> born <S%H3211><s%> in the house, <S%H1004><s%> and bought <S%H4736><s%> with money <S%H3701><s%> of the stranger, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5235><s%> were circumcised <S%H4135><s%> with him.
